question_text: Your MAU increased 40% after launching a free AI feature, but ARPU dropped 18% and infra costs rose 30%. How do you decide whether to continue investing in this feature?

question_text: Which question best uncovers user needs?
options: How do you solve this problem today?
correct_answer: How do you solve this problem today?
